item.title: [Python] Eliminate VBA Excel tool! Destroy VBA tool in Python environment where Python cannot be installed.
item.description: Even though I can't install Python, Python!? I don’t know what you’re talking about, but I’m not sure… it’s a story that anyone who understands can understand. VBA-based Excel tools are still actively used in certain industries. After all, the presence of Excel in user work is overwhelming, Therefore absolutely ExcelVBA becomes necessary. That’s why I know it’s best to write VBA normally, but But after all VBA does not accept the body,
